title: Use Cotangent Definition
text: Recall that cotangent is the reciprocal of tangent: cot(A) $$=$$ $$\frac{1}tan^$\left(A\righ$$ $$=$$ $$\frac{adjacent}{opposite}$$.

title: Identify the Sides
text: For the first triangle, identify the adjacent side (4) and the opposite side (10). For the second triangle, identify the adjacent side (8) and the opposite side (10). Divide adjacent by opposite to find cot(A).
